summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4658 for the improvement of the alley in block 47, J.H. Nagle's Addition, being the alley from East Denny Way to East John Street, between North Broadway and Harvard Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54087, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
